TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_atlantis, title = atlantis, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/atlantis} }

S.FORM: kakaizuan aicu a kadjunangan a atlantis tua sinantjaucikel a "ti tima'us kati kritiyas (Timaeus and Critias)" ni platu (Plato). kaljavaran itua sinantjaucikel ni platu tima'us amin aicu a kaizuan tua atlantis mavan a kaljavaran itua "ti tima'us kati kritiyas" sinantjaucikel ni platu. a tja kineljang aicu a kaljavaran tu na vaik ti sulun a sema idjiputu kasi caviljan a 590 a patje caviljan a 580 (BC). a sipasemalav niamadju tuki tjemaucikel timadju tua cinalivatan nua seidjiputu. a itua aicu a "tima'us" a tja mapacunan tuki vinecikan ni platu a sipatjaucikel tua atlantis tazua nu i caviljan a 360 (BC). == kasizuan ==

kakaizoan aico a kadjonangan a atlantis toa sinantjaocikel a "ti tima'os kati kritiyas (Timaeos and Critias)" ni plato (Plato). kaljavaran itoa sinantjaocikel ni plato tima'os amin aico a kaizoan toa atlantis mavan a kaljavaran itoa "ti tima'os kati kritiyas" sinantjaocikel ni plato. a tja kineljang aico a kaljavaran to na vaik ti solon a sema idjipoto kasi caviljan a 590 a patje caviljan a 580 (BC). a sipasemalav niamadjo toki tjemaocikel timadjo toa cinalivatan noa seidjipoto. a itoa aico a "tima'os" a tja mapaconan toki vinecikan ni plato a sipatjaocikel toa atlantis tazoa no i caviljan a 360 (BC). == kasizoan ==
